name: Human Needs
description:
Human Needs is a love story with a happy ending. Pursue the American Dream in sunny Gushing Meadows. Introduce yourself to the lovely new things. People your house with useful friends. Satisfy your needs.

This game is a piece of surreal interactive fiction and an inversion of systems close to our hearts. It is inspired by the Sims but plays unlike it. I hope you will be revolted by my game.

Click here to play online without downloading
